verbs.description: [ARG1: asian stocks] [V: slip] [ARGM-CAU: on continuing global trade worries] [ARG0: asian stocks] slipped monday as investor worries continued about global trade tensions and prospects for economic growth keeping score japan benchmark nikkei 225 dipped 1 2 percent to 22 426 32 while australia s&p asx 200 slipped nearly 1 1 percent in early trading to 5 832 00 south korea kospi inched down 0 2 percent to 2 156 56 hong kong hang seng fell nearly 1 0 percent to 25 553 41 while the shanghai composite edged down 0 4 percent to 2 597 15 australia international monetary fund singapore u s trade donald trump hang seng president xi jinping china japan president ig jingyi pan tokyo xi jinping new york shanghai composite brent crude south korea hong kong
